entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pinawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
